Hmm... I think the rest of you have lost what, thirteen times now? My Keyblade isn't throwing you off, is it?
The Keyblade was made to fight creatures of darkness... Oh, I don't mean you, Lady Darkness. I mean the Unversed, the Heartless, maybe even the Dream Eaters.
... Sorry, mind if I cover up? I'm still not used to showing these off to... well, people I barely know.
I'm not used to showing these to... well, complete strangers...
... It feels a bit awkward to do this around people I know. Even more than if everyone here was a complete stranger.
Keyblade armor is a useful thing to have. I can summon it when I need it, and it will keep me safe from the darkness between worlds.
The Lanes Between are pathways that connect worlds. They are dangerous to traverse, due to forces of darkness. My Keyblade armor can protect me in transit.
{small}So many worlds, so many places I could choose to settle down...{!reset} Sorry, I'm mumbling, aren't I?
Maybe I should work on getting a tan. I'd need to get a bikini for that, though...
Hmm. Maybe I could take some time at the beach to work on a tan? Though, I'd need to buy a bikini...
I hope having my Keyblade out isn't intimidating, or distracting...
Don't worry. When I lose, I'm not going to count my Keyblade as a thing to take off. I'll take off my drapes, instead.
My Keyblade may look sharp, but the real danger comes from my magic. The design I created suits me perfectly!
My Keyblade may have one of the sharper-looking designs, but the magical power of the Keyblade itself is what makes it a dangerous weapon.
The Keyblade was made to fight creatures of darkness... Unversed, Heartless, maybe even the Dream Eaters. Anything tied to the darkness should fear the Keyblade.
This is so embarrassing... Then again, if I lose another round, I'm going to have to show off even more.
If I lose another round, you're going to see more of me anyway. But even knowing that, I feel more anxious about showing off my chest.
Having people stare at me is a little off-putting... I'm meant to take pride in my body, though. Right?
You know, the ~background.surface~ doesn't feel that bad with bare feet...
(Whenever I look at Monika, why am I suddenly reminded of a beautiful piano melody?)
(When I look at Monika, I'm reminded of a beautiful melody. But when I look at Amy... why do I feel something more sinister, creeping up behind those notes?)
(Is it possible... that Amy is the darkness from someone's heart, made manifest? Maybe Monika, or maybe one of her friends...)

state.text: "The Queen of Hearts"... that's certainly a title to have.
I could show it to you both, I suppose. I was thinking of doing it regardless, but if it'll clear your doubts...
My Keyblade can always be summoned whenever I need it. Being a Keyblade Master means I am trained to fight the forces of darkness and maintain the world order.
~Player~, I know you may have wanted some help with this game, but, Chara is pretty ruthless...

case.state: I never really considered how cute I would look, but this is a pretty functional outfit for me.
Oh, thank you Dwight. This outfit supports me well during a fight, and it's a perfect fit for me.
Thank you, Aqua. You're pretty good looking yourself.
Oh come on, Lux. I'm not doing that badly. And my mastery hardly has anything to do with a game like this.
You're one to talk, Lux. You're doing worse than me at the minute. And regardless of that, my mastery has nothing to do with this game.
Why would I come here and try to `start shit', as you put it? If that's how you think most people behave, I can guarantee I'm not like that.

"Blueberry"? That's a new one.
Why would I come here and try to `start shit', as you put it?
Training with the Keyblade is so that I can fight back against the darkness, and maintain order between the worlds.
Well, Meia, the Keyblade is a weapon used to fight against the darkness, and helps in the fight to maintain order between worlds.
My Keyblade can be called to my side whenever I need it. I can bring it out later, if you want proof.
Huh? Is something wrong with my outfit? I thought it looks fine.
Is something wrong with what I'm wearing? I thought my outfit looked fine.
Really, Kaz? It sounds like you're just the person I need.
Oh, really? It sounds like you're exactly the person I need, Kaz.
Really, Kaz? Okay, I believe you. Sounds like you're exactly the person I need.
I'm only a little shy because this sort of thing is all new to me. I'm much more used to keeping my cool in a fight.
Well, I'm only shy because this is all brand new to me. I'm much better versed in fighting and keeping my head clear.
I feel like you could've asked me about this earlier. But you're right, Lux. Why are you asking?
That is a fair point, Kaz. However, I wanted to... well, honestly, I wanted to show off a little. And judge your reactions.
I get your point, Kaz. I know a weapon can be intimidating, but... well, in all honesty, I wanted to show off a little. And judge reactions,
The Keyblade's power comes from the heart. In my case, I use the light within my heart to draw out its strength.
The power of the Keyblade comes from the heart. The light within my heart draws out its true strength.
I have the task of making sure that the worlds don't fall prey to the darkness, or various other forces therein. We don't get involved in the politics of the worlds themselves...
I'm really just not used to this sort of thing, Cagliostro. I don't even know how to show off what I've got.
The thing is, Cagliostro... I don't even know how I would flaunt what I have. I'm completely new to this sort of thing.
Actually, water is one of my more rarely-used forms of magic. It so happens that I'm rather well-versed in using flame magic.

It does take some getting used to. My friends and I have shared notes. It was a bit of a shock when I escaped the Realm of Darkness, having to be caught up on the nature of Xehanort's plan to re-create the Keyblade War using seven lights and thirteen darknesses. I was there when he tried to create the -blade using Ventus and Vanitas, but Terra, Ven and I stopped that.
Well, yes. The right to use a Keyblade has to be passed down from master to student... and being a slayer of monsters isn't an automatic qualification.
Well, Aaravi, the right to use a Keyblade needs to be passed down from a master to a student. Being a proficient monster hunter isn't a qualifying factor.
You can't take the power of the Keyblade lightly. In the wrong hands, a single Keyblade can do a great deal of harm. Therefore, the Keyblade can only be passed down from master to apprentice.
A Keyblade must be passed down from master to apprentice, because in the wrong hands, even one Keyblade wielder can do a great deal of harm.
Well, since you're asking so nicely, how could I deny you? Though I was thinking it'd be a good idea to show it off anyway...
Someone did offer to take me out on a date, once, for winning a tournament. I don't exactly go looking for romance, so I guess people can tell?
I wouldn't really call it exciting. Fighting the darkness is my actual job, so of course I want to find things to do with my free time.
The magic is my own doing, Lux. The Keyblade is just very effective at channeling it, so there's no reason not to use it.
Sure thing, Y'shtola! Ask away. I'll do my best to answer, but I must warn you that I'm not well-versed in the finer details.

state.text: Unfortunately, I don't really have one to spare. My Keyblade Glider is a different form of my Keyblade, and there's only one of those.

case.state: The Keyblade's power allows it to open or seal any lock. And it has tremendous power against creatures of darkness and emotion.
`World hopping'... Well, my friends and I primarily travel the lanes between, using our Keyblades to lead the way.
Well, this `world hopping` is something my friends and I have done using our Keyblades. Specifically, we make use of the lanes between.
I've made a great deal of friends over the years. There are some whom I will always be close with, even when we're apart.
Oh, no. I've never been to Fontaine. I'm from an entirely different world to that.
It would be hard for me to pick just one. I enjoyed my time at the Castle of Dreams, but, recently I've come to love Radiant Garden more.
When I was on a mission, I had to visit the Castle of Dreams. That was a wonderful place. Recently, I've been spending most of my time in Radiant Garden.
I underwent formal training, Y'shtola. Under the training of Master Eraqus, I learned everything I needed to know about how to use the Keyblade.
Master Eraqus taught me everything I know about using the Keyblade. Though I have seen my fair share of adventure since then.
I don't have any siblings, Mari. Though, I do... I mean, Terra and I practically treated Ventus like a little brother. He's a few years younger than me.
Let's just say... I spent a long time traveling alone, and not by choice. I would've brought a friend with me if I felt more comfortable in this sort of game.
That's right. I'm not very familiar with intimate situations. Plus, meeting other people in general is a good idea, right?
There are a few reasons for its design, Cheryl. I suppose the most obvious one is that the Keyblade's power is to lock, or unlock, many things.
I could give many reasons for the shape of the Keyblade. The easiest to understand is that this weapon carries the power to lock, or unlock, almost anything.
Obtaining a Keyblade is not easy, Petra. You need to have a strong heart, and for most, you need to be chosen to inherit the power.
You could call it specialized, yes. The Keyblade is particularly effective at dealing with creatures like the Heartless. But it does have other uses.
It is specialized, yes. The Keyblade's main strength is its ability to deal with creatures such as the Unversed. But it has other uses.
Yes, that's closer to the truth of it. The Keyblade can take on many shapes. In a sense, the blade itself is merely a vessel for the power it holds.
That's somewhat close to the truth. The Keyblade has taken on many forms. You can think of it like a vessel to contain the true power.
Yes, Aloy. Seems we're both well-traveled. Everywhere has its own different conflicts to deal with.
That's right, Aloy. We're both well-traveled enough to know that there's conflict no matter where you look.
I'd say that the view of the Castle of Dreams was my favorite one. Cinderella was so lovely, too. I wish I could've stayed a bit longer to see how things turned out with her.
That may be true, ~queenie~. I fight creatures of darkness, and of negative emotion. What's it like having an older sister?
Oh, ~queenie~? I fight creatures of darkness, and of negative emotion. I don't have any siblings-- what's it like having an older sister?
Actually, there would be no need for that. I can already cast long-range magic with my Keyblade. It would be a disservice to downgrade it into a gun.
Turning the Keyblade into a gun would only be making it weaker. I can cast long-range magic with it, if I need to.
I always was more agile than Terra or Ven. I'd love to spar with you some time, Meia.
I've only ever trained with the Keyblade, as it's the only weapon I need. Outside of that, though? I like to hang out with my friends. We've still got a lot of catching up to do.
I've only ever needed the Keyblade, so it's the only weapon for me. Beyond that, I try and hang out with my friends. We have a lot of lost time to make up for.
Oh, well... You know the sort of things you can find here, Jura. I was hoping to get a little more comfortable with this side of things.
Oh, people haven't really called me pretty before. I was mostly around my friends and Master Eraquis, and they would never have said that kind of thing tome.
Well, it is pretty fun to open treasure chests. But the Keyblade can open any lock.
The Keyblade is capable of opening any lock. It can open many more things aside from that, but that's one of its most ubiquitous powers.
Aqua is the name I was born with. I don't really belong to any particular organization. {small}Especially not the organization.
I used to spend time alone in my room, reading. Or training with my friends. Lately, I've been trying to take in the sights of places like Twilight Town.
Well, I didn't have a lot of downtime when I was still training. Mostly I would spend my time alone reading. Lately I've been trying to see what I can do in places like Twilight Town.

Really? You think I'd do well with a Tamagotchi?
I don't know what that is. Could you explain it for me?

A Tamagotchi? Hmm.
I don't know what that is, exactly. Do you think you could explain it to me? Is it some kind of charm?
That's right. I'm able to travel between different worlds using my Keyblade Glider.
My deal? I'm just here to unwind a little bit. I've been under a bit of pressure lately, with all the endless fighting I've had to-- sorry, I'll not get into that.
Poetry...? I don't know. I don't think I'm good enough with my words to be able to do that.
No, I never intended to count this as a part of my clothing. I felt like showing it off for a bit, that's all.
I didn't intend to keep the Keyblade out for this long. It brought me a little bit of luck, didn't it?
The Keyblade's presence must have brought me some good luck. I didn't intend to keep it out for this long.

state.text: What a surprise. With all of these sevens I'm drawing, you'd think I'd have a little luck.

case.state: It's my turn, huh? That's fair. I can't expect to win completely flawlessly.
One little loss won't set me back too badly.
Oh. I'm doing well, aren't I? This is just fair play.
Ah, I lost. This should help even things out. I'm ahead of you, aren't I?
Considering how the rest of you are, this is more than fair.
Losing this one wasn't intentional, but I think it's fair, considering...
I've lost one of my last few advantages with that move. This game's pretty close.
I figured that my ~self.hand~ wasn't enough. Oh well. I'll take this loss.
My ~self.hand.noart~ wasn't good enough...
I thought I'd be fine with just ~self.hand~. I'll need to try harder.

state.text: Oh? I thought I had a chance there. Though, it wasn't much to bet on.

case.state: I'd say this is just a minor setback, but, I am close to losing completely...

state.text: Talk about bad luck. Though, I'm still pulling ahead, even if I lose once or twice more.

case.state: Sheesh. Talk about bad luck right near the end.

state.text: My turn again? That seems fair. I'm in the lead by just a little bit, if you care about that sort of thing.
Oh, so it's... wait, it's my turn, isn't it? I've already decided on my next move.
It's only one more loss, but I hope this doesn't turn into a losing streak.

case.state: Oh well! I won't raise a fuss about this.
Yep, looks like it's my turn. I've got a long way to go, so I'm not too worried... Not that I should be worried, right?
If we really wanted things to be fair, we'd all come dressed up the same. But that wouldn't be as interesting, would it?

state.text: I came here knowing I'd have to show myself off, and yet losing catches me off guard every time. I'm not used to being asked to strip.
I have an idea in my head about taking my socks off last. If I wanted to win, I could treat them as two different things, couldn't I?

case.state: I'm nearly out, aren't I? That's just how my luck seems to go sometimes.
My light isn't defeated so easily. Even with luck like this, I won't give in to feelings of defeat.
I figured that my ~self.hand~ wasn't enough. Oh well. I'll take this loss.

state.text: Truth be told, I would've been surprised if I had won that round.

case.state: Yep! I had nothing. That's the way it goes.
My ~self.hand.noart~ wasn't good enough...
I thought I'd be fine with just ~self.hand~. I'll need to try harder.

state.text: I really thought I had something there with ~self.hand~. Oh well!

case.state: This would be just a minor setback... but I've nearly lost, so I'm playing with fire here.
Did I already give away how bad I had it?
I made a mistake, but I've still got a chance to come back.
I feel like I'm going to fall behind, but I've only just started?

state.text: Am I doing something wrong...? It's no matter.
I'm losing pretty quickly, aren't I? Well, it's no matter. I'll get on with it.

case.state: Me again? I've got so little left to lose...
This game isn't nearly as fun when you're practically in last place.
Well, that's to be expected from only having a high card. I'll do better next time, for sure.

state.text: Again? I'm going to have to do this the hard way.
I lost again? Surely I must be making a simple mistake, if this keeps happening.

case.state: Of course I get nothing right near the end...
A high card when I'm already like this... What else can I do?
I'll have to try harder. With ~self.hand~, I still lost.

state.text: I don't understand. I know how to play this game, but I'm on the path to losing so quickly.
This is more challenging than I thought it would be.

case.state: Nothing more than a pair... I should've known I wouldn't win this battle.
I'm showing my weakness here to~background.time~. Need to correct myself.

state.text: Keeping the world order means preventing them from suffering further destruction from outside forces. We leave them alone otherwise. The Keyblade lets me fight against the darkness.

case.state: Well, this isn't exactly my world of origin either. Regardless, I fight creatures of darkness, or of negative emotion. I don't fight against other worlds.
Thank you for leading the way, Mari. I'll just slip this off so that we can be even.
I never really think about storage space. I manage to carry everything I need anyway. I don't need much.
Maybe with this, I'll inspire you to expose yourself a little bit faster, Lux?
In a way, I'm grateful that you've revealed yourself before I had to. That makes this a little bit easier.
Perhaps. They don't just let anyone run around with a Keyblade. That helps to weed out the more unsavory or foolish types.
Well, they don't just let anyone use a Keyblade. Having to inherit it from another Keyblade Master would help keep away the unsavory types.
I'm not exactly an authoritative figure. We Keyblade wielders are there to prevent the worlds from suffering further destruction, and leave them alone otherwise.
A Keyblade only lets a chosen wielder hold it. Those with the strength of heart to use one can summon or dismiss it as needed.
You do have a natural talent for it, Lux. Light magic is actually pretty rare, outside of what the Keyblade can do...
Showing off my body is just a... side effect. I want to make an impression, and I suppose showing you my Keyblade would help.
it was covered during my training. Though I don't think I remember all of the details, truth be told.
Oh! Well, thank you very much, Aqua... Grunt? I like how your hair looks in that bandana of yours.
Oh! Well, thank you very much, Aqua... Grunt? I like how your hair looked in that bandana of yours.

What? {b}No!{!reset}
I mean, no, I'm just... here to have fun, that's all.
They're certainly similar. The Keyblade is more specific to my needs. It has grown in strength as I have.
A battle of... seduction? I suppose it couldn't hurt to try.
A battle of... seduction? I think I get what you mean. Couldn't hurt to try, right?
Well, actually, ~khfriend~ here is...
I-I mean, I'm sure if I asked Terra, he might-- No, I'm here by myself to~background.time~.
You'd be right, Dunban. I have the right to call myself a Keyblade Master, in fact. It wasn't easy to earn that title, but I think I've done a good job.
Ven was actually really timid for the longest time. He had no memories of himself, so it took a while for him to warm up to us. He's got a good heart, though.
Actually, Ven was the most timid of the three of us for a long time. He'd lost his memories of himself, so it took a while for him to come out of his shell. His heart is in the right place.
Ah, so we have somewhat similar experiences. Though I was never raised or trained in a cave. Was it... nice? In the cave.
Ah, so we have a somewhat shared experience. Though I was never trained in a cave. Was that an enlightening experience?
That's right. There used to be dozens of Keyblade wielders, a very long time ago. Now, we are very few.
Well... You would have to receive the right to wield a Keyblade by having one passed down to you. Or you could prove yourself worthy if the situation arose.
Hm. Well, you would need to undergo the inheritance ceremony, where a master would pass the right to wield the Keyblade down to you.
Yes, Kyouko. Admittedly, they are rather dangerous to traverse. That's why I need my Keyblade armor. And, well, the Keyblade.
Yes, Kyouko. Though, it is a risky way to travel. To protect against the darkness, I need my Keyblade armor, glider, and... well, Keyblade.
Well, I've learned that people that visit this place are less likely to freak out when confronted by the Keyblade than I would've expected...
The Keyblade can open or close anything. Doors, chests, and the heart itself. It can seal or open the barriers between worlds.
The Keyblade can open or seal any lock. Doors, chests, hearts... Even the barriers between worlds can be opened and closed by the Keyblade.
My Keyblade was passed down to me from my master by means of the inheritance ceremony. A master chooses a successor to inherit the ability to summon their own Keyblade.
I think I understand what you mean. Though I don't think I'd even spot an opportunity like that if it was right in front of me.
If we're getting specific, then... {small}I suppose I was hoping to get a sense for how men and women look like naked, and...
I've done things alone for long enough, I don't think I'll ever take friends for granted again. But I'm not glued at the hip to them.
I spent enough time alone. I'm not exactly glued to them at the hip, but I'm not going to take my friends for granted.
I'd be a novice at fighting hand-to-hand, Meia. You could show me the ropes.

state.text: I had other things to attend to. I had to chase after Ven and Terra... I didn't have a chance to go back for a second visit.
I've seen my share of castles that are beautiful, and ones that are rather imposing. It's a wonder that I didn't get lost in Malificent's dungeon...
Cinderella was this wonderful lady. She was at the castle for a dance, I believe. I left her in the care of a handsome prince -- it was all like something out of a fairytale.

case.state: Yes, Hu Tao! I've had to travel to many different places. Usually, I'm in pursuit of creatures of darkness, such as the Unversed, or Heartless.
For the most part, I've traveled to other worlds in pursuit of creatures born from darkness, such as the Heartless, or the Unversed.
This is fashionable enough for me... it's also practical. It doesn't inhibit my movement at all. Does it really look off?
Your credentials sound impressive. Could you give me a few pointers, then? I'm not sure how to deal with new people.
It sounds like you have a good reputation. Could you give me tips, then? I need all the advice I can get.
Me? Pretty? I'm flattered, Cheryl, but you don't need to...
Well, the Keyblade is able to lock, or unlock, just about anything. Some have said that it is the guiding key to the heart.
You're very perceptive if you think you can tell a lot from the boots I wear!
The method I use to travel between worlds is a little risky, since it involves traversing the lanes between worlds. It is undoubtedly useful, though.
I'm still not used to taking this off in front of other people... Just give me a minute, okay?
I can just... Okay, please be patient with me. I'm still a little new at taking this off in front of others.
This realm is secure, so... I am Keyblade master Aqua. I'm no stranger to meeting new people from other worlds.
I know that what I share here is confidential, so... I am Keyblade master Aqua. I am familiar with travel to other worlds, meeting new people...
I haven't seen any hint of trouble in this world, so... I am Keyblade master Aqua. I've met people from other worlds before, and been to many myself.
I won't need to summon my armor to~background.time~, will I? I've always got my Keyblade with me.
I'll just get rid of these, next. Won't need to summon my armor for this, now will I? Plus, I always have my Keyblade handy.
These can summon my Keyblade armor in an instant. I won't exactly need that protection to~background.time~.
Just need to untie these, and they should come right off...
I didn't put much thought into tying these... Which actually makes them harder to take off.
Let's see, I tied it like this... And this comes undone... There we go.
I've never had to take this off in front of someone else... Just give me a minute, okay?
I can just... Okay, I've never done this in front of other people, so please be patient with me.
These shorts of mine are really tight. And if I wore anything underneath them, it'd chafe a bit, so...
I don't... Well, I don't wear underwear beneath these. I hope you don't think less of me for that, it would just chafe too much.
These shorts do their job so well, I don't feel the need to wear anything under them, aha...
I thought it'd be sexier for me to take these off last, but, I just feel like a fool now.
I really thought this would make me sexier. I guess it did, but, I also feel a bit silly now.
You've already seen everything except my feet... I feel a bit silly now, to be honest.
Well, that's true. Sorry, ~player~. I guess you didn't really stand a chance against us.
Sounds like a plan. Sorry, ~player~, but we're not going to go easy on you!

state.text: Huh? Did I say something wrong? I promise your homeworld isn't what I'm fighting against -- if anything, I would fight to protect it!
I think you have the wrong idea! I would never fight against your homeworld -- if anything, I would only visit it in order to defend it.
Wait, I think you both have the wrong idea! I would be fighting to protect your homeworld, not invade it.

case.state: A survivor...? I supposed I am one, in one sense or another.
I-I've looked worse kinds of danger in the face before, so this is... well, it's still nerve-wracking, but it's fine by comparison.
Perhaps. It takes a strong will and heart to wield a Keyblade. Plus, you have to be chosen or bequeathed one.
Depending on what you know earth as, it may -- or may not -- be as devastated as you think. {small}It's been a long time since the worlds had to separate, after all...
I also think I would really enjoy teaming up with you, Lux.
Well, when water and fire meet, things do tend to get steamy...
Well, things do get hot and steamy when water and fire mix...

state.text: Actually, the shape of the Keyblade itself doesn't matter too much. It carries an innate magic that makes it an effective weapon.

condition.saying: Which side is the sharp one?

state.text: Well, the core magic of the Keyblade makes it an effective weapon against many foes, regardless of which side I hit them with.
Well, the core magic of the Keyblade makes it an effective weapon against many foes, regardless of which side I hit them with.

case.state: I think I know a few people who could get you a better wand, Lux. Who knows? Maybe you haven't seen your full potential yet.
Oh! Alright, Petra. Thank you for having understanding... ah! I mean, thanks for understanding.
I wouldn't use that metaphor, but... Yes. I'm good at dealing with my foes.
I wouldn't exactly call it sending them to hell. And I try my best to not have to fight real people.
I'll thank you for the compliment, even if it is a little backhanded.
That's a bit of a compliment. My outfit and I compliment each other, right?
... I don't look like Goofy, do I?
It may not have been comfortable, but at least the time in the cave taught you good life lessons.
I don't know if I can tell you a lot about how a Keyblade works, Y'shtola, but I can certainly try.
Telling you everything I know about a Keyblade probably won't cover as much ground as you would have hoped, but I can try.
Don't get distracted, Kaz.
I think you're proving the point that not just anybody can be trusted with one. The Keyblade isn't meant to be used by anyone.
It takes a lot of training and effort to traverse the lanes as I do. I'm not sure how you'd do it without a glider, either...
I was trying to do something sexy. Do you have a problem with that, Nagatoro?
Oh, forgive me for trying to do something sexy. What is your problem, Nagatoro?
Thank you for the compliment, Hu Tao. I am having fun. It's just that so much of this is new to me.

state.text: ... and when I say I am a Keyblade Master, well, this is my Keyblade. Have you heard of one before?

case.state: Yes, Kaz. I... figured as much. We'll get there soon enough, I'm sure.
Oh! I... Thank you, ~solar_flare~. I appreciate it.

On another note... This is my Keyblade.
I wanted to see how you all reacted.
Now it looks like I'm playing `follow the leader', doesn't it? I planned to do this from the beginning, you know. I thought it'd make me look... well, sexy.
I-I was planning to do this all along, to fit with the spirit with the game and all. But now it looks like I'm just copying ~opp~...
I'm not very well-versed in getting to know people intimately, so... Oh, this bed is as comfortable as it looks!
Training in the art of combat has left me no time to have real connections with people on an intimate level... Also, this bed is as comfortable as it looks.
... You know, it's rude to stare at a lady's chest. Maybe I'll just go and look at the lake for a moment.

Well, here they are. My breasts Do you... like them?
This is embarrassing... I'll just look towards lake for a moment.
I'm not really experienced at getting familiar with people, so, I hope to~background.time~'s game helps me with that.
Training in the art of combat has left me no time to have real connections with people, so, I hope that I can change that to~background.time~.
I've had little-to-no time to get intimate with other people, so I hope that I can change that to~background.time~.

epilogue.hint: Finish a game against Aqua, from Kingdom Hearts.<hr><font color="navy">To unlock additional content, play with these conditions:</font> Win against Aqua with 6 or fewer layers, with a full set of 4 opponents, and without Chara present.
epilogue.title: Two Become One

scene.name: Intro
scene.directive: This epilogue isn't finished yet. Dialogue, sprites, and entire scenes will be missing.
{no-bubble fadein-nomove slower}"The worlds are made of Light and Darkness. You can't have one without the other, because darkness is half of everything."
{no-bubble}When worlds are overtaken by darkness, they fall from the realm of light and into the realm of darkness.
{no-bubble}In the realm of darkness, the Heartless thrive.
{no-bubble}When the worlds are restored back to their original form, most return to the realm of light without issue.
{no-bubble}However, some worlds do not emerge from the realm of darkness so easily. They remain trapped in a deep slumber - these are the Sleeping worlds.
{no-bubble}Worlds in a state of sleep are harder to reach. Even the Heartless cannot breach the walls that protect the Sleeping Worlds.
{no-bubble}Additionally, in a Sleeping World, time does not flow.
{no-bubble}The world may dream of what it was like when it was last awake.
{no-bubble}Even if a person no longer resides in that world, the Sleeping World may put a dream version of that person back in their place.
{no-bubble}During her travels, Aqua ventured through the realm of darkness, alone. And though it flows erratically, time does flow in this realm.
{no-bubble}As such, Aqua spent a decade of real time alone. But to her, it would be impossible to tell how much time had passed.
{no-bubble}With so much time spent alone, it was inevitable that she would eventually encounter a world in the realm of darkness that would later be pulled into the Realm of Sleep...

scene.name: 2 At the Mysterious Tower
scene.directive: {no-bubble fadein-nomove slow}Some time after your chance encounter with Aqua...
{no-bubble fadein-nomove slow}Aqua has been summoned to the Mysterious Tower, home to a certain ex-Keyblade Master and powerful sorcerer.
{epi-text}Master Yen Sid. You called for me?

{epi-text}Indeed. Thank you for coming on such short notice, Aqua.
Im afraid that the stars have brought me grave news.
But first, I have a question for you.
{epi-text}What is it?
{epi-text}Quite simply, Aqua, is it true that you went to the place between realities -- The Inventory -- recently?
{epi-text}W-What? I Yes, thats right.
{epi-text}And did you happen to encounter a certain person the one known as ~player~ while you were there?
{epi-text} Yes, thats right as well. I met ~player.ifMale(him|her)~ while I was there.
{epi-text}Hmm.
{epi-text}Aqua, I am afraid that if what I have learned is true, then ~player~ is in grave danger. A dark force has taken ~player.ifMale(him|her)~ away from ~player.ifMale(his|her)~ world of origin.
{epi-text}What? How can that be? The Inventory is supposed to protect its patrons, right?
{epi-text}Normally, yes. However, ~player~ seemed to go willingly with this individual, at least at first. Meaning these protections were not provided to them.

{epi-text}This is merely conjecture, but I believe that ~player~ was lured into a trap.
Or perhaps, it would be more apt to say that ~player~ has been turned into bait, designed to lure you to a certain place.
{epi-text}To lure me to a certain place? What makes you think this is a trap for me?

{epi-text}To answer that, I must discuss something further with you.
Aqua, you spent a great deal of time within the Realm of Darkness. However, are you familiar with the realm of the Sleeping Worlds?
{epi-text}Only slightly. We covered it briefly, during my training, but I've never visited that realm myself. I've never needed to.

{epi-text}The Sleeping Worlds are an anomaly. They are created when a world that has fallen to darkness does not fully return to the Realm of Light.
Sora and Riku dealt with most of the worlds trapped within that state of sleep. They unlocked the Sleeping Keyholes, and returned those worlds to the Realm of Light.
However, it would seem for reasons yet unknown, at least one more world remains trapped in a state of sleep.
{epi-text}I see... But what does this have to do with ~player~? You said ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ would be used to lure me somewhere?

{epi-text}What I believe to have happened is that ~player~ has been taken from the Realm of Light, but not to the Realm of Darkness. My divinations revealed to me that ~player.ifMale(his|her)~ heart lies somewhere between. And the only place that could be is within a Sleeping World.

{epi-text}But If that wasnt the world ~player~ came from, how can they travel there?
It was my understanding that you could only travel to the sleeping realms if your heart existed in at least one of those worlds in the past?

{epi-text}This world is different. This world is not from the Realm of Light.
This world seems to be in a state of sleep, through which it dreams of the time in which it was still in the Realm of Darkness.
As a result, it seems that our unknown adversary has found a way to bring ~player~ to that place without needing a vessel for them in the past.
{epi-text}But that must mean I should be able to reach ~player.ifMale(him|her)~ as well, right? I can travel there myself.

{epi-text}It can be done.
I have a spell that can send you into the Realm of Sleep as you are, but only for a short time.
However, Aqua, it is not without risk. You will lose a great deal of your power.
Luckily, the Heartless cannot invade a Sleeping World. And I sense very little presence of the Dream Eaters, for that matter.
Be on your guard, regardless. Do not assume things will go easily. Someone is trying to lure you into chasing after ~player~, after all.

{epi-text}Thanks. Im ready to go right away.
~Player~ is in trouble and it was my fault for being oblivious to this sort of thing. I have to save them.
{epi-text}There is one more thing, Aqua

{epi-text fadein-nomove slow}This Sleeping World is one that you have visited before, while you were in the Realm of Darkness. And a Sleeping World may yet dream of someone who was present within it before
{epi-text fadein-nomove slow}Good luck, and may your heart be your guiding key.

scene.name: 13-Extra (You didnt see hard mode)
scene.directive: {no-bubble fadein-nomove slower}There is additional content that you have yet to see.

{no-bubble fadein-nomove slower}An additional lewd scene can be unlocked if you face Aqua again.

Win against Aqua with 6 or fewer starting layers, at a table with 4 characters, and without the one known as Chara being present.
